body_html:
@dhingratul : I'm not sure I understand your question and what you mean by "attaching the operations to the current session/graph".

When you invoke TF_LoadLibrary, any custom operations and kernels defined in that library are registered with the TensorFlow runtime. If you then import/construct a graph that uses those operations and execute in a session, it should work.

Could you elaborate on what exactly you're trying to do, what you've tried so far, and what errors you're getting?
